name: prettier-java-formatter
description: Integration of Prettier Java into Visual Studio Code

commands.title: Prettier Java formatter: Restart Prettier server

prettier-java-formatter.pathToNode.description: Absolute path to Node home, which should end with "/bin".

prettier-java-formatter.pathToPrettier.description: Absolute path to Prettier in node_modules, which should end with "/node_modules/prettier".

prettier-java-formatter.pathToPrettierJa.description: Absolute path to plugin Prettier Java in node_modules, which should end with "/node_modules/prettier-plugin-java".

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && echo 'Extension successfully built.'
scripts.clean: rm -r dist/* && echo 'All JavaScript files successfully deleted.' || echo 'No JavaScript files to delete.'
